You might see the Quickstart guide at the very beginning when you first use . However, you can always return to this start page to replay onboarding instructions. supports the onboarding tours for:
WebUI

BDD (available for Katalon Studio version 8.4.0 onwards)
First, go to Help > Quickstart Guide. Then, choose a type of automated test to go to the corresponding onboarding tour.

image.alt: choose the type of automated testing

conbody.p: Based on the type of automated testing type you choose, shows you how to:

ul.li: Create and run your first test.
Plan your tests with the test suite.Quick Start dialog

conbody.p: Each onboarding tour has tooltip boxes displayed to guide you through the steps. The What's next? section directs you to our documentation page, where you can explore more instructions on how to use .

From version 8.4.0, introduces the onboarding tour for behavior-driven development (BDD) testing. To access the BDD onboarding tour, you need to create or open a Generic Project. Then, choose BDD as the type of automated testing.
